## ResolverStrategy.getUrlForBareModule() method

Produce a url given the components of a bare module specifier.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getUrlForBareModule?(ctx: ResolverContext, name: string, spec: string, path: string): MaybeThenable<ResolverStrategy.BareModuleResult>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ctx | ResolverContext | A <code>ResolverContext</code> that should be used for making calls to other strategy methods |
|  name | string | The name of a bare module |
|  spec | string | The optional <code>@version</code> of a bare module specifier |
|  path | string | The optional path at the end of the bare module specifier |

<b>Returns:</b>

MaybeThenable&lt;ResolverStrategy.BareModuleResult&gt;
